S.FORM: bantek bantek ku sapibihkac tu mubahelay a ayam. siwkay nu bantek u bantek sa, sapisanga' nu auk , ciid nu kiliang atu lait. maitekel ku ayam atu adidiay a aadupen. anu mazipa' kya telis nu auk, mabetil tu ku auk, masiket tu lait, maala tu ku ayam atu adidi'ay a aadupan. tinaku a kamu pabantek pabantek ci Bunuk i buyubuyuan tu elielip. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika . . . . . . Animal trapping, or simply trapping, is the use of a device to remotely catch an animal. Animals may be trapped for a variety of purposes, including food, the fur trade, hunting, pest control, and wildlife management. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan
